Spring.Helpers Namespace

Summary

Provides many easy to use class helpers & record helpers that extend some common classes in the RTL.

Classes
 NameDescription
TCollectionHelper

Represents type TCollectionHelper.

TGuidHelper

Represents a record helper for the System.TGuid structure to make it easy to use.

TMethodHelper

Provides a static method to create a TMethod structure with an instance and a methodaddress.

Represents type TRttiFieldHelper.

Top
Remarks

Classes helpers and record helpers have been introduced since Delphi 2007. The initial purpose is to allow developers to extend a class without change the original structure.

Note

A class helper type may not declare instance data, but class fields are allowed.

Warning

Class helpers and record helpers are not intended to be a design tool in Delphi. It is some kind of "patching" technology.

If you want to use these helpers, just uses the Spring.Helpers namespace in the target unit.
